OCC.DAT:
#define $triggerAbbr=DEFN #Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_references #ifdefined TEMPLATENAME #info symbol TEMPLATENAME is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define TEMPLATENAME= #Comment
#Comment end_of_references
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_mappings #Comment end_of_mappings
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_symbols #Comment end_of_symbols
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #undefine $triggerAbbr
#define $triggerAbbr=DEFN #comment The pre-defined constant $cmpStateManagedBy represents the component property 'State Managed By'. #comment See GetState and SetState triggers for usage. #comment It has one of the following values:
#define noState = 0 #define byCookie = 1 #define byStateManagerComponent = 2 #undefine $triggerAbbr

#startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=EXEC operation exec public web end #enddefine #startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=ERAS trigger erase erase if ($status <0) message $text(1763) ;error rollback else if ($status = 1) message $text(1634) ;not allowed else message $text(1806) ;OK commit endif endif end #enddefine #startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=STOR trigger store store if ($status <0) message $text(1500) ;error rollback else if ($status = 1) message $text(1723) ;no change else commit if ($status < 0) rollback else message $text(1805) ;OK endif endif endif end #enddefine #startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=RETS trigger retrieveSequential retrieve if ($status <0) message $text(1765) ;error endif end #enddefine #startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=RETR trigger retrieve retrieve if ($status < 0) message $text(1762) ;error endif end #enddefine #startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=CLR trigger clear clear end #enddefine #startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=OPER #include U:zProcError ; Report an unexpected failure in a proc statement. #enddefine #startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=GTST trigger preActivate variables string WebServerContext, Cookie, Session, UserContext, sOuter numeric i endvariables ; ======================================================================================= ; Get state ; ---------------------------------------------- ; The constants noState, byCookie and byStateManagerComponent are assumed to be defined in the Component Defines Trigger. #if ("<$cmpStateManagedBy>" = "") ; Insert your code... #elsif ("<$cmpStateManagedBy>" = "") getitem/id Cookie, $webinfo("COOKIESIN"), "MY_VARLIST_COOKIE" getlistitems/id /component Cookie ; Insert your code... #elsif ("<$cmpStateManagedBy>" = "") WebServerContext = $webinfo("WEBSERVERCONTEXT") getitem/id Session, WebServerContext, "SESSION" UserContext = "" activate "USYSSTAT".GetState(Session, $instancename, UserContext) getlistitems/id /component UserContext ; Insert your code... #endif ; <$cmpStateManagedBy> ; When using the State Manager Component: ; Use the following activates to delete an occurrence in your state table or cleanup your state table (USTATE.STATE). ; ; activate "USYSSTAT".DELETESTATE(SessionId, $instancename) ; operation DELETESTATE ; params ; string SessionId : IN ; string InstanceName : IN ; endparams ; ; activate "USYSSTAT".CLEANUPSTATE(TimeStamp) ; operation CLEANUPSTATE ; params ; datetime TimeStamp : IN ; endparams ; When TimeStamp = '0' or 'empty' all occurrences will be removed. ; When you specify a particular 'datetime' all occurrences before 'datetime' will ; be removed. ; ======================================================================================= ; ======================================================================================= ; Parse request ; ---------------------------------------------- selectcase $webrequesttype case "DYNAMIC" webload ; Get Data if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = lfHtmlMessage("WEBLOAD Failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 endif i = 1 getitem sOuter, $componentinfo($instancename, "OUTERENTITIES"), i while ($status > 0) reconnect "%%sOuter%%%" ; Reconnect Data if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = lfHtmlMessage("RECONNECT Failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 elseif ($status != 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = lfHtmlMessage("RECONNECT Failed", "$status=%%$status%%%&uSEP;ENTITY=%%sOuter%%%") return -1 endif i = i + 1 getitem sOuter, $componentinfo($instancename, "OUTERENTITIES"), i endwhile websetocc ; Set Occurrence Context if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = lfHtmlMessage("WEBSETOCC Failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 endif endselectcase ; ======================================================================================= ; ======================================================================================= ; Execution ok ; ---------------------------------------------- return (0) ; ======================================================================================= ; Error page entry lfHtmlMessage returns string params string pHeader : IN string pContextList : IN endparams variables string vMessage, VadditionalList endvariables vMessage = $replace($htmlmessage, 1, "__HEADER__", pHeader) VadditionalList = $item("ADDITIONAL", pContextList) delitem/id pContextList, "ADDITIONAL" pContextList = $concat(pContextList, "&uSEP;&uSEP;Additional:&uSEP;", VadditionalList) pContextList = $replace(pContextList, 1, "COMPONENT", "DSP_INSTANCE=%%$instancename%%%&uSEP;COMPONENT") vMessage = $replace(vMessage, 1, "__MESSAGE__", $replace(pContextList, 1, "&uSEP;", "
", -1)) ; vMessage = $concat(vMessage, "
Additional:
", $replace(vAdditional, 1, "&uSEP;", "
", -1)) return vMessage htmlmessage:blockdata ~ title __HEADER__
__MESSAGE__
~ end end #enddefine #startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=STST trigger postActivate variables string WebServerCntxt, SessionId, Varlist endvariables ; ======================================================================================= ; Generate response ; ---------------------------------------------- selectcase $webresponsetype case "UPDATE" ; Update page websave ; Generate data if ($procerror < 0) webmessage/error "websave failed (Set State)%%^$procerror = %%$procerror%%%" return (0) endif case "FULLPAGE" ; Initial page weblayout ; Generate layout if ($procerror < 0) webmessage/error "weblayout failed (Set State)%%^$procerror = %%$procerror%%%" return ($status) endif webdefinitions ; Generate component definitions if ($procerror < 0) webmessage/error "webdefinitions failed (Set State)%%^$procerror = %%$procerror%%%" return ($status) endif websave ; Generate data if ($procerror < 0) webmessage/error "websave failed (Set State)%%^$procerror = %%$procerror%%%" return (0) endif endselectcase ; ======================================================================================= ; ======================================================================================= ; Set state ; ---------------------------------------------- ; The constants noState, byCookie and byStateManagerComponent are assumed ; to be defined in the Component Defines Trigger. #if ("<$cmpStateManagedBy>" = "") ; Insert your code... #elsif ("<$cmpStateManagedBy>" = "") ; Initialize Varlist with all component variables. Varlist = $componentinfo($instancename, "VARIABLES") ; Add the current values of the component variables to Varlist. putlistitems/id /component Varlist ; Insert your code... putitem/id $webinfo("COOKIESOUT"), "MY_VARLIST_COOKIE", Varlist #elsif ("<$cmpStateManagedBy>" = "") WebServerCntxt = $webinfo("WEBSERVERCONTEXT") getitem/id SessionId, WebServerCntxt, "SESSION" ; Initialize Varlist with all component variables. Varlist = $componentinfo($instancename, "VARIABLES") ; Add the current values of the component variables to Varlist. putlistitems/id /component Varlist ; Insert your code... activate "USYSSTAT".SetState(SessionId, $instancename, Varlist) #endif ; ======================================================================================= ; ======================================================================================= ; Execution ok ; ---------------------------------------------- return (0) ; ======================================================================================= end #enddefine

Debugger

Algorithm
Encoded paste a token here
Decoded edit the payload and secret (only HS256 supported)

HEADER: ALGORITHM & TOKEN TYPE

PAYLOAD:DATA

HMACSHA256(
base64UrlEncode(header) + "." + base64UrlEncode(payload),
)

#startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=DTLF trigger detail public web scope input output endscope
variables string JWTHeader string JWTPayload string JWTSignature string JWTSignatureDecode string JWTWorking
string JWTHeaderbf64 string JWTPayloadbf64
struct structHeader struct structPayload endvariables
JWTHeader = "" JWTPayload = "" JWTSignature = "" JWTHeaderbf64 = "" JWTPayloadbf64 = ""
JWTWorking = $replace( encoded, 0, ".", "&uSEP;", -1)
getitem JWTHeader, JWTWorking, 1 getitem JWTPayload, JWTWorking, 2 getitem JWTSignature, JWTWorking, 3
; webmessage/info "Header='%%JWTHeader' Payload='%%JWTPayload' Signature='%%JWTSignature'"
if (JWTHeader = "" | JWTPayload = "" | JWTSignature = "") ; $webinfo("STATUS") = "400" ; $webinfo("OUTPUT") = HTMLOUT("Invalid JWT Token") return (-1) endif
JWTHeaderbf64 = $replace( $replace( $decode("BASE64", JWTHeader), 1, "{A", "{"), 1, "{C", "}") JWTPayloadbf64 = $replace( $replace( $decode("BASE64", JWTPayload ), 1, "{A", "{"), 1, "{C", "}")
structHeader = $newstruct structPayload = $newstruct
JSONtoStruct structHeader, JWTHeaderbf64 JSONtoStruct structPayload, JWTPayloadbf64
HEADER = "" PAYLOAD = ""
StructToJSON /whitespace JWTHeaderbf64, structHeader StructToJSON /whitespace JWTPayloadbf64 , structPayload
HEADER = JWTHeaderbf64 PAYLOAD = JWTPayloadbf64
JWTSignatureDecode = $encode( "BASE64", $encode("HMAC_SHA256", "%%JWTHEADER%%%.%%JWTPayload",secret_key ) )
end end #enddefine

#startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=DTLF trigger detail public web variables raw headerbase64, payloadbase64 string signature raw tokenRaw string tokenbase64 string jsonHeader string jsonPayload struct headerStruct, payloadStruct endvariables
#define PERIOD .
if (HEADER != "" & PAYLOAD != "")
jsontostruct headerStruct, HEADER jsontoStruct payloadStruct, PAYLOAD
structtojson jsonHeader, headerStruct structtojson jsonPayload, payloadStruct
headerbase64 = $encode("BASE64", jsonHeader) payloadBase64 = $encode("BASE64", jsonPayload) signature = "%%headerBase64%%%<PERIOD>%%payloadBase64" tokenRaw = $encode("HMAC_SHA256", signature, secret_key ) tokenBase64 = $encode("BASE64", tokenRaw)
encoded = "%%signature%%%<PERIOD>%%tokenbase64" HEADER = "" PAYLOAD = "" else webmessage/error "Header or Payload is EMPTY!" endif
end end #enddefine

#startdefine #define $triggerAbbr=DTLF trigger detail public web activate "JWT".decodeJWT( ENCODED, secret_key, $1, $2, $3, $4) if ($4 != "F") VERIFIED = "Verified " else VERIFIED = "Invalid Signature " endif end end #enddefine
